cbccore.events
Class EventManager

java.lang.Object
  cbccore.events.EventManager

public class EventManager
extends java.lang.Object

An event system based roughly on ActionScript's (Adobe Flash) and awt's event dispatching system. (yes, you may now toss insults at me based on your hate of FlashPlayer. They will all be redirected to /dev/null). Anything that dispatches an event should subclass this. Generally maintains O(1) time thanks to HashMaps! Yay HashMaps

http://www.adobe.com/livedocs/flash/9.0/ActionScriptLangRefV3/flash/events/EventDispatcher.html

I'm hoping this class is thread safe, I syncronized a few things, but no guarentees. Shouldn't matter on the CBC, as there is only one core.

Author:
Braden McDorman, Benjamin Woodruff

Method Detail

get

public static EventManager get()
Gets the main instance of EventManager. You can have more than one, but it is suggested that you just use this one with a call to getUniqueEventType()

Returns:
The singleton style instance variable of EventManager

public void disconnect(EventType type,

Removes an event listener from all types in an emitter.

Parameters:
type - The event type that IEventListener has been listening for.
listener - The listening function/object
